Module simplifier

Package ie.gmit.dip

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbstractConverter<T,​U>
    AbstractConverter is a simple abstract interface which defines the basis of a hierarchy of classes and functional interfaces of Converter types.
    AbstractConvertible<T,​U,​R>
    The interface AbstractConvertible is an abstract base type which defines the basic functionality expected in a more specialized hierarchy of convertible types, that is, something of type T is convertible to a type U, by a converter of type R.
    AbstractParsable<T>
    The interface AbstractParsable is a universal and minimal abstraction of a generic "Parsable" type, that is, a type that can be parsed, such as a file, a stream, or a command line input.
    AbstractParser<T,​U>
    The interface AbstractParser is an abstraction of a Parser type, that is, a type which can be used to parse another object.
    AbstractTextSimplifier<T,​U>
    The interface AbstractTextSimplifier is an abstraction of a type which simplifies text.
    DefaultAnsiColorCodeMap
    DefaultAnsiColorCodeMap is a functional interface with a single method, getDefaultColorMap, which returns a HashMap where the keys are a String which define, in legible human terms, a unique color, with the corresponding value being the ANSI code in the form of a String.
    Menuable<E>
    Menuable is a simple abstract interface which defines the functionality expected of a menu, including setting and configuring options, returning a list of options, and showing a list of options to a user.
    Optionable
    Optionable is an abstract interface which declares the functional behavior expected of an option which a user may wish to select or run.
    Thesaurable<T,​U,​R>
    The abstract interface Thesaurable declares the basic functionality expected of a thesaurus, that is a mapping of a String or multiple String types, to another String or multiple String types.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFileParser<T>
    The class AbstractFileParser is an abstract base type which implements the AbstractParser interface and therefore must have methods associated with setting some input which is to be parsed, and subsequently parsing the input.
    AbstractStringConverter
    AbstractStringConverter is an abstract base class which implements the AbstractConverter interface.
    ConfigurableAnsiColorCodeMap
    ConfigurableAnsiColorCodeMap is a simple class which allows the user to define, control, and extend the colors used for printing text to a terminal/console window.
    ConvertibleString
    ConvertibleString is a concrete class which implements the AbstractConvertible interface.
    InteractiveTextSimplifierSession
    InteractiveTextSimplifierSession is a simple utility class that allows the user to interact with and control the functionality embedded in the ThesaurusMapTextSimplifier via an in-built menu (RunnableCommandLineOptionMenu) of RunnableCommandLineOption options.
    IterativeStringSplitter
    The class IterativeStringSplitter is a concrete type that implements the AbstractParser interface.
    OneToOneMappedThesaurus
    OneToOneMappedThesaurus is a concrete class which implements the Thesaurable interface.
    OneToOneMappedThesaurusBuilder
    OneToOneMappedThesaurusBuilder is a concrete class which is used to construct a OneToOneMappedThesaurus from a pair of files, one file containing a thesaurus of words, with synonyms entered as comma separated values on each line, and the other file containing a list of priority words to which words in the thesaurus should be mapped when said priority word is encountered in the thesaurus.
    ParsableFile
    The class ParsableFile is a concrete Bean class that extends the java.io.File base class by implementing the AbstractParsable interface.
    RunnableCommandLineOption
    RunnableCommandLineOption is a concrete class that implements the Optionable, Comparable and Runnable interfaces.
    RunnableCommandLineOptionMenu
    RunnableCommandLineOptionMenu is a concrete class which implements the abstract Menuable interface.
    Runner
    A simple Runner class to instantiate an InteractiveTextSimplifierSession
    SimpleFileParser
    The class SimpleFileParser is an concrete type which extends the abstract base type AbstractFileParser by fully implementing a parse functionality.
    StringCaseConverter
    StringCaseConverter is an concrete class which extends the abstract base class AbstractStringConverter.
    StringColourConverter
    StringColourConverter is a concrete class which extends the abstract base class AbstractStringConverter.
    StringSynonymConverter
    StringSynonymConverter is a concrete class which extends the abstract base class AbstractStringConverter.
    TerminalInputParser
    Concrete class whose primary responsibility is to perform various terminal/console parsing operations.
    TerminalTitleWriter
    This is a simple static utility class for writing titles and borders to a terminal window in a controllable and consistent manner.
    ThesaurusMapTextSimplifier
    ThesaurusMapTextSimplifier is a concrete and highly specialized class which allows a user to perform a range of operations related to simplifying text, and controlling its color, based on command line input.
